about_1: Galaxydholdings Investment Trader provides reliable, consistent and profitable financial assistance to our clients around the world. Investments in our trading platforms are securely secured and managed only by our experienced traders to ensure better risk management and profitable trading.
about_2: Stay connected to the market with our web mobile wallet. Featuring advanced order types and analytical tools for experienced traders, as well as a simple buy & sell interface for those just getting started.
about_3: We provide premium access to crypto trading for both individuals and institutions through high liquidity, reliable order execution and constant uptime.
hero_2: Get diversified crypto and blockchain exposure with our institutional-grade funds.
ease_3: Withdraw funds to any other wallet
unlimited: The funds arm of Galaxy Digital
advanced: ADVANCED TOOLS PACKED IN AN INTUITIVE INTERFACE
z_a_body: Galaxy Digital is a diversified financial services innovator on a mission to institutionalize digital assets and blockchain technology. We’re building one of the most comprehensive platforms in the sector with five business lines and 350+ employees across six offices worldwide.
advanced_body: The world is rapidly digitizing, and blockchain will play a critical role in this global transformation. For those interested in exploiting this trend, invest in a basket of digital assets and get diversified exposure to the major categories of blockchain technology. Investing in index products has historically provided investors opportunities to capture the upside of new asset classes without having to pick “winners.” Investing in this new asset class is no different. Our index products allow investors to broadly participate in the overall trend of digitization through diversified exposure to digital assets.
apis_body: Set up your own trading interface or deploy your algorithmic strategy with our high-performance FIX and HTTP APIs. Connect to our WebSocket for real-time data streaming.
support_body: Premium 24/7 support available to all customers worldwide by phone or email. Dedicated account managers for partners.
no_investments: You have made no investments recently

privacy: This site is protected by hCaptcha and its Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
t_c_caption: In using this website you are deemed to have read and agreed to the following terms and conditions:
privacy_body: Galaxydholdings Investments Limited knows that you care how information about you is used and shared. Hence we make a strong commitment to protect and respect the privacy principles regarding the information that you provide. All the data given by a member to Galaxydholdings Investments Limited will be only privately used and not disclosed to any third parties. We will not sell, share, or rent your personal information to any third party or use your e-mail address for unsolicited mail. Any emails sent by this Company will only be in connection with the provision of agreed services.
guidance_body: Trading carry a high degree of risk, and may not be suitable for all investors. Before deciding to invest in Galaxydholdings Investments Limited you should carefully consider your financial condition and your level of experience. You should be aware of all the risks associated with trading and seek advice from an independent financial adviser if you have any doubts. The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment and therefore you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. You are investing at your own risk and you agree that a past performance is not a guarantee for the same future performance.
u_o_s_body: SPAM violators will be permanently removed from the site with immediate effect. Galaxydholdings Investments Limited reserves the right to accept or decline any member for membership without explanation.
r_g_body: Galaxydholdings Invesments Limited is available only to the members of the site. You agree to be of legal age in your country to join this site and in all the cases your minimum age must be 18 years. Every deposit is considered to be a private transaction between Galaxydholdings Investments Limited and its member.
d_l_body: We reserve the right to change the rules, commissions and rates of the program at any time and at our sole discretion without notice, especially in order to respect the integrity of the members' interests as a whole. You agree that it is your sole responsibility to review the current terms.
goal_body: Let's help you save your future and stress with the power of diversified asset management system.
mission_body: We are a global private markets investor with strong trading roots and a long, well-established track record. We are committed to building long-term relationships with our investors, investment partners and colleagues based on trust, openness, respect and the highest standards of integrity and professionalism.
mission_title_1: We will be the private markets partner of choice for our investors by:
m_t_b: Ensuring that our interests are aligned with theirs
m_t_c: Working collaboratively and openly to exceed expectations through best-in-class private markets solutions, investor reporting and client service
mission_title_2: We will be a preferred investment partner by:
m_t_d: Employing a professional, fact-based investment approach grounded in a deep understanding of private markets
m_t_e: Being a trusted, collaborative, long-term partner
m_t_f: Providing a global investment perspective informed by our long and successful history of private markets investing
mission_title_3: We will attract, develop and retain exceptional professionals by:
m_t_g: Providing and reinforcing a one-team culture that is both supportive and challenging
m_t_h: Ensuring that our interactions are founded on honesty and mutual respect
m_t_i: Expecting, recognizing and celebrating excellence in everything we do

e_body: Accredited Investor - You are accredited as an individual if you made over $200,000 in the last two calendar years (or $300,000 with your spouse), or if you have greater than $1,000,000 in liquid net worth, excluding your primary residence.
